name: New Subway Run- Electric Boat
description:
New Subway Run- Electric Boat is a new adventure for a miguel music games, who wants to collect coins, so you have to help our hero to drive, run over obstacles , it's one of the most exciting game adventure.
FEATURES
Run unlimited as much as possible and collect coins
Touch the Screen anywhere to Jump
Fun and addictive running and jumping game
Vibrant graphics and multiple environments
Get more coins
Stunning nature settings
